#include <iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long i,t;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        int flag=0;
        for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
        {
            if(s[i]=='a'||s[i]=='A'||s[i]=='e'||s[i]=='E'||s[i]=='i'||s[i]=='I'||s[i]=='O'||s[i]=='o'||s[i]=='u'||s[i]=='U')
             {
                 flag=1;
                 break;
             }
        }
        if(flag==1)
            printf("yes\n");
        else printf("no\n");
    }
    return 0;

}
